node.title: Kiwi films shocking moment ute ploughs into his vehicle on busy road, leaving him with head injuries
node.description: "I was trapped in the vehicle for about 20 minutes because the vehicles were locked together."
node.content: ["A Kiwi man caught the shocking moment a ute ploughed into his vehicle on dashcam.", "The crash left him trapped in his vehicle with head injuries for 20 minutes until emergency service arrived.", "The man, who doesn't want to be named, told Newshub he was heading to the other side of town in Hastings at 2pm last Friday when a van turning right at an intersection hit him.", "Footage of the incident shows the man driving down a busy road when the white ute does a 90-degree turn across the lane directly into his path. The impact instantly cracks his windscreen and sets off the airbags, while the man's vehicle is knocked into a traffic sign.", "\"I'm really tall and I hit my head on the interior of the vehicle so I was actually a bit concerned about myself to be honest,\" he told Newshub.", "\"I was trapped in the vehicle for about 20 minutes because the vehicles were locked together and with my head injury we weren't keen to get me climbing out through the passenger side.", "\"Emergency services were on the scene pretty quickly. Ambo and fire managed to separate the vehicles and get me out.\"", "The man was in hospital for around three-and-a-half hours where he was treated for a minor head injury and a minor hand injury.", "He says he's fortunate to drive a modern car with updated safety features - which he says contributed to decreasing the level of his injuries.\u00a0"]
